bcbioRnaseq
  • Reference

Plot rRNA Mapping Rate

Plot rRNA Mapping Rate

plot_rrna_mapping_rate(object, ...)

.plot_rrna_mapping_rate(metrics, interesting_group = "sample_name",
  warn_limit = 10L, flip = TRUE)

# S4 method for bcbioRNADataSet
plot_rrna_mapping_rate(object, ...)

# S4 method for data.frame
plot_rrna_mapping_rate(object, ...)

Arguments

object

Object.
...

Additional arguments.
metrics

Metrics data.frame generated by metrics().
interesting_group

Optional. Category to use to group samples (color and shape). If unset, this is automatically determined by the metadata set inside the bcbioRNADataSet.
warn_limit

Threshold to plot warning color marker.
flip

Flip X and Y axes.

Value

ggplot.

See also

Other Quality Control Plots: plot_5_3_bias, plot_count_density, plot_counts_per_gene, plot_exonic_mapping_rate, plot_gene_detection_saturation, plot_genes_detected, plot_intronic_mapping_rate, plot_mapped_reads, plot_mapping_rate, plot_total_reads

Examples

data(bcb)

# bcbioRNADataSet
plot_rrna_mapping_rate(bcb)

# data.frame
metrics <- metrics(bcb)
plot_rrna_mapping_rate(metrics)
